Contact Us
navigation placeholders
CONTACT Dove Rest RV
Ready to book your stay at Dove Rest RV Park? It’s easy to reserve your spot! Whether you’re planning a quick getaway or a longer stay, we’ve got the perfect space waiting for you.
Get in Touch with Us
We encourage you to feel free to reach out to us through various channels, including phone, email, or by filling out our convenient contact form, which is designed to be user-friendly and accessible. Our dedicated team is fully committed to responding promptly to your inquiries and ensuring that you receive the information you need in a timely manner.
We genuinely look forward to connecting with you, addressing any questions or concerns you may have, and providing the assistance you need in planning your visit. Our goal is to ensure you have a wonderful experience, filled with memorable moments and enjoyable activities tailored to your interests. We fully understand that questions and concerns can arise at any time, whether it's during the day or late into the night.
That is precisely why we are wholeheartedly committed to being here for you, prepared and ready to assist you. Our goal is to help you navigate any challenges or inquiries that may come your way, no matter how big or small they might be. Your peace of mind is important to us, and we want to ensure that you always have the support you need when you need it most.
Office Hours:
Office hours are set times when employees are available for work-related activities and meetings. They establish a consistent schedule for colleagues and clients to seek assistance, promoting a productive work environment by streamlining communication.
Monday - Saturday
9:00a.m. - 5:00p.m.
OFFICE IS CLOSED ON SUNDAY
Open for RV arrivals only
Got Questions?
We’d love to hear from you! Whether you have questions, need more information, or are ready to book your stay, feel free to reach out.
Contact Us

Contact Us
BOOK Your Space At Dove Rest
now
$ 44.99
per day + Tax
Easily reserve your Dove Rest RV Space in advance. No need to circle the RV Park looking for a space for you and your family, or wasting time and money on places you don't know. With our convenient online reservation system, you can guarantee a secure safe RV spot and save time when you arrive.
Great Spots At Dove Rest RV
now
$245.00
per week + Tax
This tranquil park is well-positioned right off Interstate-10, which provides easy access to nearby Historic Downtown Marianna, Blue Springs, as well as the state capital, Tallahassee. Guests can choose from a wide variety of attractions to visit and on-site amenities, including tent sites, a barbecue area, bathhouses, complimentary Wi-Fi at all sites. NEW POOL COMING IN 2024
Things To Do In Marianna
Plan your TRIP Events & Dining
Jackson County offers an array of things to do. Pick your pleasure either outdoors, underground or learning Jackson County’s history. Canoe and kayak the scenic Chipola River, relax while tubing down Spring Creek, swim at Blue Springs Recreation Area, or fish for Bass in Lake Seminole. Explore the Alamo Cave at Hinson Conservation & Recreation Area. Merritt’s Mill Pond is home to some of the most incredible cave diving in the world.
Where To Eat In Marianna
Great Restaurants for the Whole Family
No one leaves a restaurant hungry in the land of flowing sweet tea and hearty southern-style food. Southerners are known for a variety of food choices to satisfy the palate. Choose from buffet-style southern home cooking, steak, seafood or fresh salads, or sandwiches at locally owned establishments. Whatever you’re in the mood for, the choice is yours.  Don't forget, you are only 40 minutes to the gulf coast where the whole family can enjoy the beach.
Contact info
﻿
850-482-5313
doverestrvpark@gmail.com
1973 Dove Rest Drive, Marianna, FL 32448, USA

HEAD RT JS Include
End of HEAD RT JS Include
photoswipe markup
Root element of PhotoSwipe. Must have class pswp.
Background of PhotoSwipe. 
         It's a separate element as animating opacity is faster than rgba().
Slides wrapper with overflow:hidden.
Container that holds slides. 
            PhotoSwipe keeps only 3 of them in the DOM to save memory.
            Don't modify these 3 pswp__item elements, data is added later on.
Default (PhotoSwipeUI_Default) interface on top of sliding area. Can be changed.
Controls are self-explanatory. Order can be changed.
Preloader demo http://codepen.io/dimsemenov/pen/yyBWoR
element will get class pswp__preloader--active when preloader is running

Share by:

Attractions and Events
navigation placeholders
Places To Go TO
PLACES TO Explore
places to discover
Endless Fun and Adventure
Marianna and the surrounding area offer endless opportunities for fun and adventure. Whether you seek thrilling outdoor activities, cultural experiences, or a chance to relax, you’ll find it all here. From the natural beauty of local parks to exciting recreational pursuits, this destination promises memorable enjoyment for everyone.
Jackson County presents a diverse array of activities that cater to various interests, ensuring that there is something for everyone to enjoy. Whether you're drawn to the thrill of outdoor recreation, the intrigue of underground exploration, or the pursuit of historical and cultural education, you'll find plenty of options to engage your senses and pique your curiosity.
To immerse yourself in the region's natural beauty, explore the enchanting Chipola River by canoe or kayak, enjoy a tubing adventure on Spring Creek, swim at Blue Springs Recreation Area, or fish for Bass at Lake Seminole. For a taste of Jackson County’s rich history and culture, visit significant historic sites that highlight the area's past. With so many exciting options, the question becomes not "What do we do?" but "What do we do first?"
Let’s Discover Together.

ABOUT US
navigation placeholders
more about us
We offer affordable rates for your stay with options to suit your needs.
Whether you’re here for a quick getaway or a longer stay, we’ve got you covered!
CHECK OUT OUR PROMO!!
ABOUT US
Welcome to Dove Rest RV Park, your serene escape nestled in the heart of Florida's panhandle. With 72 full hookup (FHU) sites offering water, electric, sewer, and complimentary WiFi, our park provides everything you need for a comfortable and enjoyable stay.
Dove Rest RV Park has a story of resilience and renewal. After sustaining significant damage from Hurricane Michael in 2018, the park has undergone an incredible transformation. Since August 2023, our dedicated managers, Robin and Vicki, along with their amazing team of workampers, have worked tirelessly to revitalize the park and make it better than ever.
﻿
We welcome you and your furry companions with open arms. Our pet-friendly environment includes a spacious off-leash play area, perfect for your fur babies to run and play freely.
Contact us
Amenities and Facilities
Full Hookup (FHU) RV Sites
Enjoy water, electric, sewer, and complimentary WiFi at all 92 spacious, well-maintained sites.
Contact us
Laundry Facilities
We offer 2 laundry facilities.  One in the front of the park and another in the back of the park
Contact us
Clean and Quiet Grounds
Relax in our serene, well-maintained environment, perfect for unwinding after a day of travel or adventure.
Contact us
Location
Dove Rest RV Park is ideally situated for both relaxation and adventure. Located just 3/4 mile south of I-10 at Exit 142, we’re central to some of the region’s best destinations:
The beautiful beaches of the Gulf Coast
The historic charm of Tallahassee
The friendly community of Dothan, Alabama
Join Our Community
We warmly invite you to experience the unique charm, hospitality, and sense of belonging that make Dove Rest RV Park truly special. Whether you're seeking a peaceful retreat to relax, planning to explore the beautiful surrounding areas, or looking to connect with fellow travelers who share your love for adventure, you'll discover a welcoming environment that feels like home. At Dove Rest RV Park, every guest becomes part of our community, creating memories that last a lifetime.
Make a Reservation
Got Questions?
We’d love to hear from you! Whether you have questions, need more information, or are ready to book your stay, feel free to reach out.
